column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We came in on a Wednesday evening and got sat after about a 1.5 hour wait. Our server
column3: greeted us promptly and got us started with a pitcher of sangria (which poured us about 2-3 glasses each). While we were looking at the tapas she recommended that we start off with some pintxos
column4: so we ordered the pintxos platter. Everything was bite size and super tasty - our favorite was the bacon-wrapped date!
